title: section 4 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Emergency Measures in the Public
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Emergency Measures in the Public 

Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (Section 4) (No. 2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited emergency measure public interest (covid-19) act 2020 (section 4) (no 2) order 2020

title: section 4 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020
heading: 2. The emergency period is extended for such period as expires on 01
text_raw:
2. The emergency period is extended for such period as expires on 01 

August 2020 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

20 July, 2020. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

TÁNAISTE. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th July, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [254] 3
text_norm: 2 emergency period extended period expires 01 august 2020 given official seal government 20 july 2020 leo varadkar tanaiste notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th july 2020 254 3

title: section 4 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (Section 
4) (No. 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 254 of 2020) extends the emergency period 
defined in section 3 of Part 2 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest 
(Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020) to expire on 01 August 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [254]
